casebody.data:
No. 09-804. CIGNA Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. Janice C. Amara, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated. 562 U.S. 1041, 131 S. Ct. 624, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8870.

178 L. Ed. 2d 432,

November 15, 2010.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
